strings: <voice_0x0100181F><se_low>Chen Mui: I have a secret to confess. This is not the final resting place of my daughter and your mother, Xia.
<voice_0x01001820><se_low>Chen Mui: It seemed only right to bury her with Eltrio, after all they had suffered.
<voice_0x01001821><se_low>Chen Mui: Now, at least, in death, they can be together...
